title: Calories in the Baconator
meta_description: Discover calories in the baconator from Wendy's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Wendy's classic Baconator: two beef patties, American cheese, six bacon strips, mayo, ketchup, on a bun; standard serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on Wendy's standard data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Wendy's Baconator has 960 kcal, with 57 g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant info.

tweaks.label: Remove the bun for low-carb option
Add a side of small fries

faqs.q: How many calories in the baconator?
What's the protein in a baconator?
faqs.a: About 57 g of protein per Baconator.

faqs.q: Is the baconator high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, it has 2210 mg of sodium, over 90% of daily recommended intake.
Removing the bun cuts it to about 740 kcal.
66 g total fat, including 27 g saturated fat.
